content.question: In the second sentence of the second paragraph, the author uses an em dash to set off a list that

choices.label: warns his audience against feeling complacent about past struggles
indicates the extent of his personal engagement with various civil rights struggles around the world
stimulates the audience’s sympathy by referencing groups with whose struggles they are likely familiar
encourage his audience to join a political movement by enumerating issues likely to engage their interest

content.answer: stimulates the audience’s sympathy by referencing groups with whose struggles they are likely familiar

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
